description: I can fix your kitchen faucet leak and improve the water pressure. The issue is likely worn-out O-rings and a clogged aerator. I have the necessary parts in my van.
Power surge damage requires testing all circuits and likely replacing some outlets and possibly a breaker. I'll bring my testing equipment to diagnose properly.
Custom built-in shelves with quality materials. I'll provide a detailed design sketch first and use premium wood with professional finish.
Bathroom painting with proper preparation including primer for water stains. Will use moisture-resistant paint suitable for bathrooms.
Samsung front-loader repair - likely needs drain pump replacement and belt adjustment. I stock Samsung parts and can complete today.
